about_the_game:
Following the success of the first Throne Lady pack, here comes an addition containing extra items and lots of supernatural elements. New hand positions, multiple items in the background and even grittier characters than in the first pack! Mix both packs together to create the perfect composition.
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.
External artwork by Ivanina Elena @art_zdesiseitsas.

Available categories:
- 20 beast head
- 8 body detail
- 16 boots
- 56 hand types in 5 different positions
- 7 cloak
- 12 colorable hair
- 14 hair preset
- 4 dress
- 10 face
- 4 head detail
- 1 extra leg type
- 10 necklace
- 10 pants
- 16 skull
- 5 tentacles
- 3 tights
- 23 top
- 4 underwear
- 10 waist item
- 12 wings

Additional content available to all Throne Lady packs in the General category:
- 8 animal
- 5 aura
- 23 background
- 15+10 effect
- 18 item with multi-select
- 10 light
- 12 throne

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1370 x 770 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1440 pixels or higher desktop resolution

short_description: Following the success of the first Throne Lady pack, here comes an addition containing extra items and lots of supernatural elements. New hand positions, multiple items in the background and even grittier characters than in the first pack! Mix both packs together to create the perfect composition.
